remarks: Associativity of an operation on reals.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-1996.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
genp.1 $e |- F = ( w e. P. , v e. P. |-> { x | E. y e. w E. z e. v x = ( y G z ) } ) $.
genp.2 $e |- ( ( y e. Q. /\ z e. Q. ) -> ( y G z ) e. Q. ) $.
genpass.4 $e |- dom F = ( P. X. P. ) $.
genpass.5 $e |- ( ( f e. P. /\ g e. P. ) -> ( f F g ) e. P. ) $.
genpass.6 $e |- ( ( f G g ) G h ) = ( f G ( g G h ) ) $.
genpass $p |- ( ( A F B ) F C ) = ( A F ( B F C ) ) $.
$d A f g h x y z $.
$d B f g h x y z $.
$d C f g h x y z $.
$d F f g h x y z $.
$d G f g h v w x y z $.
